channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: $10 Short? No Health Insurance For You
item.description: Some people's insurance plans change from free to $5 or $10/month. That small difference is enough for many of them to lose coverage.

item.title: Google’s Android Decision—200 Million Users Need A New Phone
item.description: Is your phone at risk—check this now.

item.title: Navigating SOC 2 Compliance: A CTO's Perspective
item.description: Data protection is paramount in our industry, and demonstrating that commitment is crucial, especially when pursuing larger clients.
